thread.title: Roadies: Karan Kundrra loses his cool, slaps a contestant | Zee News
thread.title_full: Roadies: Karan Kundrra loses his cool, slaps a contestant | Zee News

title: Roadies: Karan Kundrra loses his cool, slaps a contestant | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Indian television sensation Karan Kundrra is apparently not amused with the contestants of the latest season of 'Roadies'. According to the latest reports, the 32-year-old lost his control during an audition episode and slapped hard one of the auditioners. 
In a viral video, which appears out to be a promo of the show, Karan asked the contestant whether he has ever slapped his sister. And, when the guy said yes, he went forward and slapped him hard. 
Wait, this isnâ€™t it! MUST READ
